name: searchengine

params.description: API key, mandatory if autoconf service has not been charged in advance
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: position of component into the map, 'topleft' by default
params.name: options.position
options.zoomTo

params.description: set placeholder in search bar. Default is "Rechercher un lieu, une adresse".
params.name: options.placeholder

params.description: set a marker on search result, defaults to true.
params.name: options.displayMarker

params.description: set a marker style. Currently possible values are "blue" (default value), "orange", "red" and "green". But you can use an L.Icon object (see {@link http://leafletjs.com/reference-1.2.0.html#icon L.Icon }).
params.name: options.markerStyle

params.description: resources to be used by geocode and autocompletion services, by default : ["StreetAddress", "PositionOfInterest"]
params.name: options.resources

params.description: False to disable advanced search tools (it will not be displayed). Default is true (displayed)
params.name: options.displayAdvancedSearch

params.description: trigger a geocoding request if the autocompletion does not return any suggestions, false by default
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.triggerGeocode

params.description: waiting time before sending the geocoding request, 1000ms by default
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.triggerDelay
